meanings.definition: causing a person to hallucinate or experience distortions in perception
meanings.sent1: The colorful lights at the concert were so trippy.
meanings.sent2: The trippy patterns on the wall seemed to move.
meanings.sent3: The trippy mirror made my reflection look like a funhouse version of myself.
meanings.sent4: The trippy music took me on a journey through my imagination.
meanings.sent5: The trippy movie made me feel like I was in a dream.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of the use of psychedelic drugs
meanings.sent1: The artist's paintings had a trippy vibe to them.
meanings.sent2: The trippy posters at the music festival reminded me of the 60s.
meanings.sent3: Wearing those trippy glasses made everything look like a wild party.
meanings.sent4: The trippy colors of the tie-dye shirt swirled together like a psychedelic dream.
meanings.sent5: The trippy artwork on the album cover matched the band's experimental sound.

meanings.definition: visually stimulating in a way that is surreal or bizarre
meanings.sent1: The trippy artwork on the walls captivated everyone at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The trippy video effects made the music video stand out.
meanings.sent3: The trippy neon sign made the street look like a futuristic wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The trippy landscape in the painting seemed to come alive.
meanings.sent5: The trippy illustrations in the book sparked my imagination.
